text: He put a pig in a flock of sheep, and made peace with them. But one day the shepherd caught him and the pig started groaning and chewing. The shepherds rebuked him, saying, "He has kept on reaching out to us too, and we have never complained". "Yes", replied the pig, "but not for the same purpose. You are being handed over for the wool, but I am being handed over for my flesh. He's not worried about losing the replaceable, but he does worry about the irreplaceable.
title: El cerdo y los carneros
author: nan Esopo
